critique: The document is an executive order issued by President Obama in response to the crisis in Ukraine in 2014. It declares a national emergency and imposes sanctions on individuals and entities undermining democratic processes and institutions in Ukraine. The order blocks property and interests in property of those persons, suspends their entry into the United States, and prohibits donations to or for their benefit. It also authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to take actions necessary to carry out the purposes of the order.
